title: I cant be the only one that thought the Lee Sin mix was terrible.
body:
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/community-spotlight/lee-sin-mix


Seriously.

His voice just doesnt work in a mix like this (And the volume doesnt help), they just repeated the exact same line (Even more so than other mixes) and the animation was boring as hell.

I mean, the mixes were never works of art, but this is just on a whole new level of mediocrity.
